definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Le 23:11 sheaf (swath, row of fallen grain, Wetzst:Z. f. Ethnol. 1873, 273 (Syr. Dreschtafel), ag. him Vogelstein:Landwirthschaft in Pal, 61 who trans. heap of sheaves);—´[[ע]] abs. De 24:19, Le 23:11, Le 23:12, Le 23:15, cstr. v:Le 23:10; fig. of food (abs.) Job 24:10; pl. [[עֳמָרִים]] lit. Ru 2:7, Ru 2:15.
